text:
The Grammy Awards 2018 pink carpet was filled with daring hair and make-up seems to be.

In case you’re trying to step out of the field and check out one thing new, watching celebrities stroll down the carpet was like turning the pages of a magnificence journal simply earlier than your hair or make-up appointment. You are sure to discover a look that matches you, or no less than some inspiration you can add your twist to.

From Hailee Steinfeld‘s emerald eyes to SZA‘s lengthy voluminous waves to Cyndi Lauper‘s unicorn-impressed hair, celebs amped up their seems, utilizing their genuine fashion (except for Miley Cyrus, who dialed it again for the ceremony).
